scripts.start: firebase use santas-workshop-193b5 && ng serve santashop-admin --port=4100
scripts.start:test: firebase use santas-workshop-test && ng serve santashop-admin --port=4100
scripts.prebuild: npm run build -w @santashop/models && npm run build:prod -w @santashop/core
scripts.build:test: npm run prebuild && ng build santashop-admin --configuration=test
scripts.build:prod: npm run prebuild && ng build santashop-admin --configuration=production
scripts.deploy:test: firebase use santas-workshop-test && firebase target santashop-admin && ng build santashop-admin --configuration=test && firebase deploy
scripts.deploy:test:hosting: firebase use santas-workshop-test && firebase target santashop-admin && ng build santashop-admin --configuration=test && firebase deploy --only hosting
